column7: NOTE: non-voice-actor name readings are taken from mobygames. hope they've done their research, because despite their longevity, hunex was never a big successful developer with tons of localized games to pull actual readings from.

NOTE: mobygames claims this is "shiori" (apparently for a developer named "shiori ide"), treating the in-game credit 詩　織 as though it were a single name, 詩織. from what i can tell, 詩 can't really be parsed as a name by itself, so i guess i'll go with that.

column7: NOTE: this is "director" in katakana, as opposed to 森山豊治's title of 監督. the position in the credits makes it obvious this is more of an executive/company head kind of role, but i couldn't tell you exactly what distinction this is supposed to indicate.

column7: NOTE: this next set of messages is not used, and the code described by them doesn't work. in the finished game, the voice actor bonus messages were rolled into the "green room" bonus itself, which made having a separate code redundant.
